title: "It's Ok Frodo, I Actually Don't See Height" - Systemic Racism in D&D
itunes:title: "It's Ok Frodo, I Actually Don't See Height" - Systemic Racism in D&D
description:
Let's explore systemic racism in DND. Today we unpack 'Orcs, Britons, And The Martial Race Myth, Part II: They're Not Human' written by James Mendez Hodes. Also, stay tuned for a Wiz of the Rings at the end of the show ... Star Wars Edition. 

ARTICLE LINK: https://jamesmendezhodes.com/blog/2019/6/30/orcs-britons-and-the-martial-race-myth-part-ii-theyre-not-human 

*** TRIGGER WARNING ***

This article [and episode] includes descriptions of racism, colonialism, imperialism, racist violence, sexual assault, and fools tryna gaslight you telling you what you’re sure is racist isn’t racist.
